string-array.name: Achievements
string-array.item: First Scan!, You scanned one person, 50, ach_front_test, S1, SIN, P_SCAN:1
Second Scan!, You have scanned two people. Keep going, 50, ach_front_test, S2, SIN, P_SCAN:2
GOGO! Towards Infinity!, Infinity is actually quite far off, 25, someimg3, SI0, INF, P_SCAN:0:2^c
Pure Electric!, You have gone on all three electric buses, 30, someimg, C1, COL, B_RIDE:E_BUS1/E_BUS2/E_BUS3
Best Of Two Worlds, You have managed to catch all seven of the hybrids, 50, someimg, C2, COL, B_RIDE:H_BUS1/H_BUS2/H_BUS3/H_BUS4/H_BUS5/H_BUS6/H_BUS7
Off Road!, Your bus went off route, 30, ach_front_test, S3, API, API:true/CURRENT_BUS/Offroute/5
